title: All airline tickets issued locally up by 27% from today: CAASL
body_lines: The Civil Aviation Authority of Sri Lanka (CAASL) today announced that the prices of all airline tickets issued from Sri Lanka have been increased by 27% from today due to the the depreciation of the LKR reaching Rs. 259.99 against US Dollar.
The CAASL Chairman said 99 of the previously traded amount was LKR 203.66.
However, the cost of all airline tickets issued in Sri Lanka has increased by 27% with effect from today. (Chaturanga Samarawickrama)
